宨字的基本解释

宨
tiǎo
轻佻放肆。

宨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiǎo］
［《集韻》土了切，上筱，透。］
轻佻放肆。

宨字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　宨； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页285第06
【集韻】土了切，音朓。肆也。輕宨，放肆也。　又【正字通】一說窕宨音切同。引《詩傳》窈窕，幽閒貞靜意。《字彙》專訓輕宨，非。○按諸韻書，止《集韻》有宨字。《詩·周南》窈窕本从穴。《爾雅·釋言》窕肆也，註輕窕者，好放肆也，亦从穴。《正字通》所引音義?與窕同，恐卽窕字之譌。

宨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
宨字的起名意思

暂无。

Frivolous.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tiǎo］
["Ji Yun" cuts the earth and cuts, on the small, through. ]
Frivolous.
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【The first chapter of Yinji】【The Department of Luo Characters】　宨; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 285 06
[Jiyun] The earth is cut, the sound is tuned. Si also. Qinghen, presumptuous.　 [Zhengzitong] once said that the sound is the same. Quoting "The Book of Songs" is slim, quiet and quiet. "Zihui" specializes in training light courtesy, non. ○According to all rhyme books, only "Jiyun" has the word 宨. "Poetry·Zhou Nan" is a slim and slender book from acupoints. "Erya · Interpretation of Words" is sloppy, note the light sloppy, so presumptuous, also from the acupuncture point. The pronunciation and meaning of "Zhengzitong" is the same as 窕, afraid of 卽窕字.
